summary:
A GPU (Graphics Processing Unit) is a powerful computer chip designed to handle complex visual tasks. It can be found in computers, game consoles, and even phones. GPUs were first made to improve images and graphics, but they're also great for other tasks that need lots of calculations at once.

These tasks include training artificial intelligence models and helping with cryptocurrency. So, GPUs are not just for gaming; they're important for many different technology applications.
title: Graphics processing unit
